mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.merchant_code, m.merchant_name FROM inno72_interact_merchant im LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant m ON m.id = im.merchant_id WHERE m.is_delete = 0 AND im.interact_id = #{interactId}

SELECT distinct im.machine_code AS machineCode,m.merchant_code AS sellerId ,area.province,area.city,l.`name` AS area FROM inno72_interact_machine im JOIN inno72_interact_machine_goods img ON im.id = img.interact_machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_machine mm ON mm.id = im.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_goods g ON g.id = img.goods_id LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant m ON g.seller_id = m.id LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = mm.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON area.`code`=l.area_code WHERE img.type = 0 and im.interact_id =#{activityId}

SELECT distinct m.machine_code,ms.merchant_code,area.province,area.city,l.`name` AS area FROM inno72_activity_plan_game_result apg LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan ap ON ap.id = apg.activity_plan_id LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan_machine apm ON apm.activity_plan_id = apg.activity_plan_id LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON m.id = apm.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_goods g ON g.id = apg.prize_id LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant ms ON ms.id = g.seller_id LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON area.`code`=l.area_code WHERE m.machine_status = 4 AND ap.is_delete = 0 AND apg.prize_type = 1 AND ap.activity_id=#{activityId}
